eventDateTime.description: Date time of the operation from the caller point of view

eventIdentifierProcess.description: Example: Entry GUID, Destruction operation Id

eventTypeProcess.description: entry, access, query, freeze, destruction, audit, preservation, platform, internal

eventOutcomeDetailMessage.description: Command related to this log entry

agentIdentifier.description: Agent from which this entry is set

agentIdentifierApplication.description: Application from which this eventProces is requested

agentIdentifierApplicationSession.description: Application Session ID from which this eventProces is requested

eventIdentifierRequest.description: Internal Vitam Session ID from which this eventProces is requested

agentIdentifierSubmission.description: Submission Agency from which this eventProces is requested

agentIdentifierOriginating.description: Originating Agency from which this eventProces is requested

objectIdentifier.description: Id of the item on which the operation is (For Entry: objectIdentifier = GUID of SIP)

objectIdentifierRequest.description: Request that select the various items on which the operation is (for operations occuring on a select query)
